sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Move current License key field in Software Entitlement table to new License key table</description> <name>Create License key records</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var script = 'SAMPremiumUtils.createLicenseKey();'; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-02-03 23:07:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>36a69f980b30320037af440ff6673ac3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create License key records</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_36a69f980b30320037af440ff6673ac3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-22 20:16:23</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
